ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the last 3 months: Have you used marijuana during the past 3 months?
In the last 3 months: Did you think your use of marijuana was out of control?
Notes: 0= Never/Almost Never; 1= Sometimes; 2= Often; 3= Always/Nearly Always

ElementDescription: In the last 3 months: Did the prospect of not having marijuana make you anxious or worried?
Notes: 0= Never/Almost Never; 1= Sometimes; 2= Often; 3= Always/Nearly Always

ElementDescription: In the last 3 months: Did you worry about your use of marijuana?
Notes: 0= Never/Almost Never; 1= Sometimes; 2= Often; 3= Always/Nearly Always

ElementDescription: In the last 3 months: Did you wish you could stop using marijuana?
Notes: 0= Never/Almost Never; 1= Sometimes; 2= Often; 3= Always/Nearly Always

ElementDescription: In the last 3 months: How difficult did you find it to stop, or go without marijuana?
Notes: 0= Not Difficult; 1= Quite Difficult; 2= Very Difficult; 3= Impossible

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months: Have you used (substance) during the past 12 months?
In the last 12 months: Did you think your use of (substance) was out of control?
Notes: 0= Never/Almost Never; 1= Sometimes; 2= Often; 3= Always/Nearly Always

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months: Did the prospect of missing a fix, shot, or dose make you feel anxious or worried?
Notes: 0= Never/Almost Never; 1= Sometimes; 2= Often; 3= Always/Nearly Always

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months: Did you worry about your use of (substance)?
Notes: 0= Never/Almost Never; 1= Sometimes; 2= Often; 3= Always/Nearly Always

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months: Did you wish you could stop?
Notes: 0= Never/Almost Never; 1= Sometimes; 2= Often; 3= Always/Nearly Always

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months: How difficult did you find it to stop, or go without (substance)?
Notes: 0= Not Difficult; 1= Quite Difficult; 2= Very Difficult; 3= Impossible

ElementDescription: The Severity of Dependence Scale: Total Score
